name: Renegade: Crabtastrophe!
description:
Protect the Atrium from a crab infestation in this demo for the upcoming VR game Renegade: Space Survivor.
In this free demo you find yourself in an abandoned space station run by Dallas, a pod robot who dreams of being a cowboy. Your introduction is cut short when a swarm of space crabs bursts through the air vents! Move, climb, and fly around the station in a zero-gravity environment and use a variety of sci-fi weapons to eradicate the space crabs. A full game based in the universe of Renegade is coming soon to Oculus! Keep an eye out for Renegade: Space Survivor coming soon to early access. If you enjoyed this free demo follow us on Twitter to receive updates on the games development.
